Once again, if any of this is moding to Spears, it is void. She's in 
stasis lock, so I'm kinda carrying her and placing her in pallets, 
but if Logo objects, I'll void this post.

GTG. Be back in 5 hours or so.

::Slayer/Kluster/Firearm::

Slayer nods.

"It will be done," he says, flying toward Lunarpine, his gun ready.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm lands at the Cybertronian Fire, passing the shields and 
holding onto Spears tightly. If she woke up and ran off, it wouldn't 
be too good.

He enters, raising an eyebrow when he sees Kluster standing with a 
wheeled pallet behind him. The pallet had reinforced arm leg, and 
head straps, and had a strange device above the "pillow".

"Most of the crew are out on missions, so I'm stuck with the fetching 
jobs," Kluster explains as Firearm puts Spears on the pallet, "That 
device will block out transmissions and also acts as a scan jammer."

Firearm looks at Kluster like the bot had finally snapped. "Sir, I 
have been on this ship for a while now, I'm not one of the new 
Maximals."

Kluster smiles, realizing he had been explaining something to Firearm 
that Firearm probably knew everything there was to know about. 
"Sorry, hosting a factions isn't exactly easy on the nerves, you 
know."

Firearm nods, moving the pallet and heading over toward the lab with 
it. "Do you know if we have a bot specialist on this ship, sir? My 
knowledge of surgery and reprogramming might not be enough for this. 
Its pretty limited."

to
